item.title: Why your holiday gift returns might go to a landfill and what you can do about it
item.description: The month after Christmas has been dubbed “Returnuary” for good reason

item.title: Iran seizes an oil tanker in the Strait of Hormuz
item.description: Iran has seized a foreign oil tanker in the Strait of Hormuz

item.title: Asian shares are mixed after US stocks drift to more records
item.description: Asian shares are mixed in thin holiday trading, with most markets in the region and elsewhere closed for Christmas

item.title: Judge upholds Hawaii's new climate change tax on cruise passengers
item.description: A federal judge's ruling allows Hawaii's new tourist tax, which includes a levy on cruise ship passengers, to take effect in 2026

item.title: Telluride Ski Resort in Colorado to close Saturday due to labor dispute
item.description: Officials at Colorado's Telluride Ski Resort say it will close Saturday due to a labor dispute
